alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 10:05AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Mobile County through 1100 AM CDT... At 1004 AM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a waterspout over the Gulf of Mexico roughly 9 miles southwest of Dauphin Island, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Waterspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Waterspouts can easily overturn boats and create locally hazardous waters. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dauphin Island. WATERSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for southwestern Alabama.
